Header: Money worth Rs. 32, 500 nabbed from Pinnaduwa filling station
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) â€“ In a robbery reported in Pinnaduwa, two men who had arrived at the Pinnaduwa Filling station on a motorbike had intimidated the employees of the filling station and nabbed Rs. 32,500. Although the two suspects who had arrived at the scene had pulled out a gun to threaten the employees they had only shot in the air. Investigations are currently underway on the incident that took place last night (October 31).
